thread.section_title: The Blakely New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of The Blakely New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Laura H
title: Excellent
text: Great hotel in an ideal location for first time visitors. 10 minute walk from Central Park and Times Square. 20 minute walk to the Empire State Building. Rooms are very spacious and clean. Breakfast offered is continental but lots of pastries, cereals and fruits/yogurt to chose from. Staff very friendly and would definitely stay again!
